amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Federal Aviation Administration for the bio-data assessment in the hiring of the Air Traffic Control Specialists.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the FAA for the bio-data assessment in hiring of Air Traffic Control Specialists.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hultgren amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 186 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hultgren amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 186 (Roll no. 321).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Hultgren.
